content.rendered:
Long-range wireless panic button. Wireless panic button alarm system.

Class-leading, high-performance long-range receivers for wireless security applications.

excerpt.rendered:
• Input voltage: 12~24VDC or 9~22VAC
  • Frequency of operation: 403MHz
  • 9 Way trinary encryption
  • Switching capacity: Single pole relay NO/NC (5A DC)
